remarks: Hao Wang's identity axiom P6 in Irving Copi, _Symbolic Logic_ (5th ed., 1979), p. 328.  In traditional predicate calculus, this is a sole axiom for identity from which the usual ones can be derived.  (Contributed by NM, 9-May-2005.)
statement:
sb10f.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
sb10f $p |- ( [ y / z ] ph <-> E. x ( x = y /\ [ x / z ] ph ) ) $.
$d x y $.
